title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE). The user suggests the following improvements for the Editor Selection Dialog:

a. Enable multiple selection

c. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as (default)

f. Add a width hint for the dialog

g. Investigate the height growth of the File editors Pref page when selected

KLM made a note on 10/10/2001 at 1:54:57 PM.

Also:

f. What is the reason for the File editors Pref page growing in height when it is selected, while no other pages behave the same? 

KLM released fixes for a, c, f, and g on 10/10/2001 at 5:58:58 PM.
SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)

1. Open the preference page and go to 'Workbench' > 'File Editors'.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' (Still no selection).
4. Press OK. This should add the selected external editor.
